body.name: Noctua NH-L9a-AM5, Premium Low-Profile CPU Cooler for AMD AM5 (Brown)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 6 hrs 36 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 13 hrs 36 mins
features: Proven premium heatsink (more than 100 awards and recommendations from international hardware websites), latest revision for AMD’s AM5 (LGA1718) platform
Only 37mm height allows it to fit compact HTPC and Small Form Factor (SFF) cases, tailored footprint guarantees 100% RAM and PCIe compatibility on all ITX, Micro-ATX and ATX AM5 motherboards
Renowned, award-winning NF-A9x14 slim 92mm fan with Low-Noise Adaptor and PWM for automatic speed control: full cooling performance under load, whisper quiet at idle!
Includes high-end NT-H1 thermal paste and SecuFirm2 mounting system for easy installation on AMD AM5 (LGA1718) processors
Renowned Noctua quality backed up by 6-year manufacturer’s warranty, deluxe choice for AMD Ryzen processors with moderate heat load (e.g. 7900, 7700, 7600, see compatibility list)
body.description: Cooler Specifications Please Note: The NH-L9a-AM5 is a highly compact, quiet low-profile cooler designed for use in small form factor cases and HTPC environments. While it provides first-rate performance in its class, it is not suitable for overclocking and or CPUs that create high heat loads. Scope of delivery NF-A9x14 HS-PWM premium fanNA-RC7 Low-Noise Adaptor (L.N.A)NT-H1 high-grade thermal compoundSecuFirm2 AM5 mounting kitScrews for 92x92x25mm fansNoctua metal case-badge

productInformation.name: Material
productInformation.value: Copper (base and heat-pipes), aluminium (cooling fins), soldered joints & nickel plating

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The NH-L9a-AM5 is the latest, AM5-specific revision of Noctua’s award-winning NH-L9a low-profile CPU cooler for AMD Ryzen based HTPCs and Small Form Factor (SFF) systems. At a height of only 37mm, the NH-L9a is ideal for extremely slim cases and, due to its small footprint, it provides 100% RAM and PCIe compatibility as well as easy access to near-socket connectors even on tightly packed mini-ITX motherboards. The custom-designed SecuFirm2 mounting system for the AM5 socket makes installation a breeze and, thanks to the highly optimised NF-A9x14 92mm fan that supports fully automatic speed control via PWM, the NH-L9a-AM5 runs remarkably quietly. Topped off with Noctua’s renowned NT-H1 thermal compound, the NH-L9a-AM5 combines everything users have come to expect from Noctua’s larger coolers into a super-compact, premium-quality package for ITX and HTPC builds with AMD AM5 processors.

37mm low profile Due to the slim 23mm heatsink and the NF-A9x14 low-profile fan that measures only 14mm in thickness, the NH-L9 stands a mere 37mm tall, which makes it ideal for use in compact HTPCs or Small Form Factor cases that offer minimum clearance for CPU coolers. 100% RAM compatibility The NH-L9a-AM5 has a compact footprint that fully complies with the socket keep-out zones specified by AMD. This means that neither the heatsink nor the fan overhang the RAM, so the cooler provides easy access to the slots and is fully compatible with tall memory modules. 100% compatibility with PCIe cards Some AMD-based mini-ITX motherboards have the PCIe slot located close to the CPU socket zone. While larger coolers that exceed this zone may block the PCIe slot, the compact-sized NH-L9a-AM5 provides full compatibility with PCIe cards. NF-A9x14 PWM premium fan The highly optimised, award-winning NF-A9x14 premium fan features Noctua's proprietary AAO frame as well as sophisticated aerodynamic design measures. Supporting PWM for fully automatic speed control, the NF-A9x14 allows the NH-L9a to stay remarkably quiet.

Measurements Height (without fan): 23 mm Width (without fan): 114 mm Depth (without fan): 92 mm Height (with fan): 37 mm Width (with fan): 114 mm Depth (with fan): 92 mm Weight (without fan): 390 g Weight (with fan): 465 g Material Copper (base and heat-pipes), aluminium (cooling fins), soldered joints & nickel plating Cooler Specifications Please Note: The NH-L9a-AM5 is a highly compact, quiet low-profile cooler designed for use in small form factor cases and HTPC environments. While it provides first-rate performance in its class, it is not suitable for overclocking and or CPUs that create high heat loads. Scope of delivery NF-A9x14 HS-PWM premium fanNA-RC7 Low-Noise Adaptor (L.N.A)NT-H1 high-grade thermal compoundSecuFirm2 AM5 mounting kitScrews for 92x92x25mm fansNoctua metal case-badge

New revision for AMD’s AM5 (LGA1718) socket Please note that being a dedicated special edition for AM5, the NH-L9a-AM5 comes with AM5 mounting hardware only. (For full socket compatibility, see table below)

NH-L9i NH-L9a-AM4 NH-L9a-AM5 NH-L9i chromax.black NH-L9a-AM4 chromax.black NH-L9a-AM5 chromax.black LGA2066, LGA2011-0 & LGA2011-3 X X X X X X LGA1700 X X X X X X LGA1200, LGA115x (LGA1150, LGA1151, LGA1155, LGA1156) ✓ X X ✓ X X LGA775 & LGA1366 X X X X X X Xeon LGA2011 Narrow ILM / Xeon LGA1366 & LGA1356 X X X X X X Xeon LGA3647 X X X X X X Xeon LGA4189 X X X X X X AM4 with NM-AM4-L9aL9i ✓ with NM-AM4-L9aL9i with NM-AM4-L9aL9i ✓ with NM-AM4-L9aL9i AM5 with NM-AM5-L9aL9i with NM-AM5-L9aL9i ✓ with NM-AM5-L9aL9i with NM-AM5-L9aL9i ✓ sTRx4, sWRX8, TR4, SP3 X X X X X X

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great use of space, very efficient, incredibly good performance at low volume.
reviews.reviewText: I've got this cooling a r9 7900, in a very SFF case, and it does beautifully. Even under full load, the noise is perfectly acceptable. General use, it is whisper quiet. To be expected of Noctua cooling solutions. One of the best, if not the best, low profile coolers on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a Mini-ITX build
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly in my In Win Chopin case. Using this model on AMD 5700G and 7900 CPUs. So far has kept both cool enough to have never shut down. Very quiet, even under stress. Have both cases sitting on the desk right beside the monitors and rarely notice any noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great performance and low noise, but...
reviews.reviewText: This cooler has great performance. However, the lack of a backplate and the inability to screw the cooler down through the front makes it a pain (and a mess) to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well made, but difficult mounting process
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to install onto my new-ITX build using AM5 motherboard.Quality is 100%. The installation process however, was a pain and took me at least 30-40 minutes to mount the tiny screws to the mounting hole. The provided screws made things increasingly difficult and at times messy as you have thermal paste and your looking around trying to line up the tiny screws in order to mount. I was able to get it to fit on properly, but was a tedious process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is amazing how small this fan is. It was a little tricky to screw onto the CPU and make sure to look up if your CPU is compatible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly with my am5 nas server
